macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US Stock Indexes Close Slightly Lower on Tuesday, December 30
items.summary: Major US indexes ended the day with small losses: S&P 500 down 0.1% to 6,894.24, Dow Jones down 0.2% to 48,367.06, Nasdaq down 0.2% to 23,419.08, and Russell 2000 down 0.8% to 2,500.59. Despite recent dips, all indexes are on track for strong 2025 annual gains, with S&P 500 up 17.3%, Nasdaq up 21.3%.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Stabilizes Around $88,000-$90,000 After Q4 Decline of Over 22%
items.summary: Bitcoin is trading near $88,000-$90,000, down over 22% in Q4 2025—its worst December since 2018—while Ethereum holds around $2,900-$3,000 amid selling pressure and fearful market sentiment. Total crypto market cap remains stable at about $3 trillion despite underperformance versus gold and stocks.
items.source: FXStreet, CoinDesk, Sergey Tereshkin, Economic Times

items.title: Grayscale Files for First Bittensor ETF with SEC
items.summary: Grayscale has submitted an S-1 filing to the SEC to launch the first U.S. Bittensor ETF, providing regulated access to $TAO, the token of Bittensor’s decentralized AI blockchain, signaling rising institutional interest in AI-crypto assets.

items.title: FOMC Minutes Signal 'Higher for Longer' Rates, Pressuring Crypto Markets
items.summary: Federal Reserve's December FOMC minutes indicate a pause in rate cuts, reinforcing 'higher for longer' policy that weighs on Bitcoin and risk assets, with BTC range-bound at $85K-$90K amid subdued volumes and cautious sentiment.

items.title: Top Gainers: Canton, Four, and Plasma Post Double-Digit Rallies
items.summary: Canton (CC), Four (FORM), and Plasma (XPL) lead 24-hour gainers with double-digit increases, with Canton extending recovery and others targeting breaks above key EMAs.

items.title: Crypto Lags Gold and Stocks in 2025, But Analysts Predict 2026 Catch-Up Rally
items.summary: Bitcoin down 20% since November while gold rose 9% and S&P 500 gained 1%; long-term BTC holders have stopped selling, active addresses up 5.5%, setting stage for potential capital rotation and rally in 2026.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Evermind AI Launches EverMemOS for Persistent AI Memory
items.summary: Evermind AI released EverMemOS, a foundational memory infrastructure for agentic AI that enables long-term memory, adaptation, and evolution, achieving 92.3% accuracy on LoCoMo and 82% on LongMemEval-S benchmarks. Complementary technologies like EverMemModel approach 100 million token context lengths.

items.title: US Army Establishes Dedicated AI and Machine Learning Officer Career Field
items.summary: The Army announced a new 49B specialty for officers starting January 2026 via Voluntary Transfer Incentive Program, aimed at advancing data-centric and AI-enabled forces with graduate training and hands-on experience.

items.title: Neel Somani Discusses Future of Transparent AI Systems
items.summary: AI expert Neel Somani highlights rising demand for interpretable AI models using techniques like feature attribution, layer visualization, and structured reasoning to balance accuracy with oversight amid growing model complexity.

items.title: AI Accelerates Market Abuse Surveillance with Reduced False Positives
items.summary: Regulators like Germany’s BaFin and Italy’s Consob leverage AI, NLP, and ML for faster detection of manipulation, insider trading, and complex schemes, with future capabilities in proactive threat anticipation.

items.title: One Stop Systems Sells Bressner to Focus on AI, ML, and Edge Computing
items.summary: One Stop Systems completed a $22.4 million sale of Bressner Technology GmbH to sharpen focus on core growth in AI, machine learning, and rugged edge compute markets.

items.title: AI Model Risk Management Market to Grow at 12% CAGR to 2029
items.summary: Driven by AI/ML adoption in regulated industries and increasing model complexity, the market is projected to expand from $2.324 billion in 2024, emphasizing governance, monitoring, and compliance frameworks.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
